title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IX, pt. 218 - Prohibition Against Geographical Redlining And Discriminating In Certain Property/casualty Policies
content:

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 307, 308, 3429, 3429-a, 3430, 3433, art. 24, 34; Financial Services Law, §§ 202, 302

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
